original_text: But Onan knew that the child would not be his; so whenever he slept with his brother’s wife, he spilled his semen on the ground to keep from providing offspring for his brother.
korean_text: 오난이 그 씨가 자기 것이 되지 않을 줄 알므로 형수에게 들어갔을 때에 그의 형에게 씨를 주지 아니하려고 땅에 설정하매

sentences.original_text: that the child would not be his
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아이가 자신의 것이 될 것이라는 사실을

sentences.original_text: so whenever he slept with his brother's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그가 자신의 형제의 아내와 동침할 때마다

sentences.original_text: he spilled his semen on the ground
to keep from providing offspring for his brother
sentences.korean_translation: 자신의 형제에게 자손을 제공하지 않기 위해
